It provides a platform for all stakeholders in the healthcare system to network, exchange best practices, and take action together. It's a fantastic initiative that we are proud to support. We are already looking forward to next year's continuation of this event. Dr. Sandra Kluge, Dr. med. Eckart von Hirschhausen, Yvonne Sieler, Hans-JÃ¼rgen OberkÃ¶nig, Julia Klein, Katharina Polydoros, Janine Helbing, Jenny Kossian, Falk Sommer, Dr. Renate MÃ¼ller, Sophia Wagner, Dr. Albrecht Kloepfer, Marie-Claire Nielsen, Maurizio BÃ¤r, Dr. Rabea Stockert #WeACTCon2024 #GemeinsamWirken #healthcare #innovation #sustainability #greenhealth #nextgenerationhealthcare

ğŸ—“ ğ—¦ğ—®ğ˜ƒğ—² ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ——ğ—®ğ˜ğ—²: ğ—¦ğ—²ğ—½ğ˜ğ—²ğ—ºğ—¯ğ—²ğ—¿ ğŸ­ğŸ¬ğ˜ğ—µ â€“ ğ—˜ğ˜…ğ—½ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—”ğ—œâ€™ğ˜€ ğ—¥ğ—¼ğ—¹ğ—² ğ—¶ğ—» ğ—›ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¹ğ˜ğ—µğ—°ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—²! ğŸš€ Artificial Intelligence is poised to revolutionize healthcare, promising enhanced patient outcomes, improved quality of care, and greater operational efficiency. But does it truly deliver on its promise? Join us on September 10, 2024, at 6:30 PM CEST in Berlin, for our event, "AI in Healthcare - Between Ambition and Reality," hosted in collaboration with Merantix Momentum and Future4Care. Dive into the exciting world of AI in the healthcare sector and explore the transformative potential of AI technologies for the future. Our event will feature distinguished experts from various healthcare sectors who will discuss the current state of AI from regulatory, industry, payor, and provider perspectives. They will share concrete examples, highlighting both the success factors and pitfalls of implementing AI technology in their fields. Stay tuned for speaker announcements! ğŸ“£ Click here to register for the event â¡ https://lu.ma/jfa7t1le We look forward to your participation and an engaging exchange of ideas. If you have any questions about the event, please feel free to reach out to our principal, Karen Piontek. Merantix AI Campus #ai #artificialintelligence #machinelearning #llm #healthcare #nextgenerationhealthcare

ğŸŒŸ ğ—™ğ—¹ğ˜†ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—›ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¹ğ˜ğ—µ ğ—§ğ—²ğ—®ğ—º ğ—˜ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—»ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğŸŒŸ Last week, our team gathered in Berlin for a strategy day. Of course, we took the opportunity to enjoy a dinner together, stepping away from the office to connect, exchange ideas, and simply enjoy each otherâ€™s company. Moments like these not only strengthen our relationships but also make us an even stronger team. ğŸ’ªğŸ¤ We are proud to have a team that harmonizes not just professionally but personally as well. ğ——ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—™ğ˜‚ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—² ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—›ğ—²ğ—®ğ—¹ğ˜ğ—µğ—°ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—² ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—µ ğ—”ğ—œ: AGAPLESION gAG â€œğ—ğ—œ ğ—šğ—¶ğ—½ğ—³ğ—²ğ—¹â€ ğŸš€ We are excited to share that our Senior Consultant, Dr. Rabea Stockert, recently attended the Agaplesion KI Gipfel. This innovative event brought together interdisciplinary teams to explore the potential of AI in healthcare. With an inspiring keynote by Fabian Lechner and input from Google, Microsoft, IBM, and Siemens Healthineers, Rabea supported the interdisciplinary teams from Agaplesion as external expert in the identification of key areas where AI could enhance patient care and simplify internal processes. The event generated a wealth of innovative ideas that have the potential to bring huge advantages to Agaplesion employees and patients. Now, the challenge is to transform these ideas into reality. If you are interested in delving deeper into AI in healthcare, feel free to reach out to Rabea. A big thank you to Agaplesion for the invitation and organization of this successful day. #healthcare #AI #innovation #hospitals #nextgenerationhealthcare Claudia MÃ¶ller, Sebastian Polag, Bettina GeiÃŸler-Nielsen, Jan Geesen, Marc Bastien, Matthias Bauer, Eric Ballnath, Jan-Peter PreuÃŸ, Alfred T., Sebastian KÃ¼hn, Sebastian Sahner ğŸ“¸ by AGAPLESION gAG/Isabelle Jauernich

ğŸ“¢ ğ—”ğ—¿ğ—² ğ˜†ğ—¼ğ˜‚ ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—²ğ—± ğ—¶ğ—» ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—°ğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ˜€ ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—µğ—²ğ—®ğ—¹ğ˜ğ—µ ğ—®ğ—½ğ—½ğ˜€ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—½ğ—µğ˜†ğ˜€ğ—¶ğ—°ğ—¶ğ—®ğ—»ğ˜€ ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—½ğ˜€ğ˜†ğ—°ğ—µğ—¼ğ˜ğ—µğ—²ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—½ğ—¶ğ˜€ğ˜ğ˜€ ğ—¶ğ—» ğ—šğ—²ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ—»ğ˜†? ğŸ’¡ Then you definitely must read the latest research article by our Head of Startups and M&A, Prof. Dr. Florian K. "ğ˜™ğ˜¢ğ˜±ğ˜ªğ˜¥ ğ˜³ğ˜¦ğ˜·ğ˜ªğ˜¦ğ˜¸ ğ˜°ğ˜¯ ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¦ ğ˜ªğ˜¯ğ˜¤ğ˜¦ğ˜¯ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜·ğ˜¦ğ˜´ ğ˜°ğ˜§ ğ˜¥ğ˜ªğ˜¨ğ˜ªğ˜µğ˜¢ğ˜­ ğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜¢ğ˜­ğ˜µğ˜© ğ˜¢ğ˜±ğ˜±ğ˜´ ğ˜§ğ˜°ğ˜³ ğ˜±ğ˜©ğ˜ºğ˜´ğ˜ªğ˜¤ğ˜ªğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜´ ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ğ˜¥ ğ˜±ğ˜´ğ˜ºğ˜¤ğ˜©ğ˜°ğ˜µğ˜©ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜¢ğ˜±ğ˜ªğ˜´ğ˜µğ˜´: ğ˜ˆ ğ˜ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜®ğ˜¢ğ˜¯ ğ˜±ğ˜¦ğ˜³ğ˜´ğ˜±ğ˜¦ğ˜¤ğ˜µğ˜ªğ˜·ğ˜¦." Together with his co-authors, Prof. Dr. Cordula Kreuzenbeck, Prof. Dr. Brit Schneider, and Prof. Dr. Sophie Brenner, Florian presents the following key findings: ğŸ”¹ User experience and costs are major barriers for physicians and psychotherapists when considering prescribing a DiGA. ğŸ”¹ The DiGA prescription and activation process should be made easier for HCPs as well as patients. #ERezept ğŸ”¹ Additionally, there is a need for improved capturing and communication of the (health economic) value of DiGAs. Here is the link to the article: https://lnkd.in/e4i-8_Qv If you are interested in this topic, feel free to contact Florian. He looks forward to engaging with you. ğŸ¤ #DigitalHealth #DiGA #eHealth #MedicalResearch #HealthTech #nextgenerationhealthcare

ğŸ“¢ ğ—˜ğ˜…ğ—°ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—˜ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ ğ—”ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—¿ğ˜ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—®ğ—»ğ˜†ğ—¼ğ—»ğ—² ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜ƒğ—¼ğ—¹ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—± ğ˜„ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—µ ğ˜„ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—¸ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—°ğ—² ğ—½ğ—¹ğ—®ğ—»ğ—»ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—¶ğ—» ğ—šğ—²ğ—¿ğ—ºğ—®ğ—» ğ—›ğ—¼ğ˜€ğ—½ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¹ğ˜€! ğŸ¥ Our Flying Health partner ATOSS Software SE is hosting a free Online Summit on August 7, 2024, starting at 9:30 AM. The focus will be on efficiently implementing the PPR 2.0 nursing staff assessment in clinical practice. On July 1, 2024, the Nursing Staff Assessment Regulation (PPBV) came into effect for all hospitals in Germany, making PPR 2.0 mandatory nationwide. Hospitals must now determine, and report staffing needs and actual staffing levels and demonstrate compliance with minimum staffing requirements on all wards by October 1, 2024. Join the digital PPR 2.0 Summit for exclusive expert insights: ğŸ”¹ Recommendations for process design ğŸ”¹ Implementation tips ğŸ”¹ The importance of system interoperability in patient and staff planning ğŸ”¹ Practical experiences Learn more and register now: https://lnkd.in/eNFQAFpt #healthcare #digitalhealth #ATOSS #pflege #ppr2 #pflegemanagement #Pflegepersonalbemessungsverordnung

ğŸ¥ ğ—ªğ—µğ—®ğ˜ ğ—±ğ—¼ğ—²ğ˜€ ğ˜ğ—µğ—² ğ—µğ—¼ğ˜€ğ—½ğ—¶ğ˜ğ—®ğ—¹ ğ—¼ğ—³ ğŸ®ğŸ¬ğŸ°ğŸ¬ ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—¼ğ—¸ ğ—¹ğ—¶ğ—¸ğ—²? ğŸ’¡ This question is thoroughly explored in the book "Das Krankenhaus der Zukunft â€“ Herausforderungen, Chancen, Innovationen." Featuring over 50 contributions from leading healthcare experts, the book highlights the major trends and transformations anticipated in the coming years. The focus is on the opportunities and potential of reimagined healthcare. In their insightful contribution, our Principal Alexander Whyte, together with Laura Wamprecht, delves into the pivotal role startups can play in this transformation. We firmly believe that startups are crucial in addressing the central challenges of sustainability, digitalization, and financing in the hospital landscape. Are you a startup struggling to get your product working for the hospital market in Germany? Reach out to Alex and speak to our team of experts. You can get the book in both print and eBook formats here: https://lnkd.in/d9fied-y We look forward to your feedback. A big thank you to the editors, Dr. rer. pol. Gerald GaÃŸ, Prof. Dr. Henriette Neumeyer, MD, MBA, and Ingo Morell, for their initiative and to all the contributors for their inspiring insights. MWV Medizinisch Wissenschaftliche Verlagsgesellschaft #healthcare #digitalhealth #hostpitals #innovation

This question is at the heart of the "Praxissalon" evenings organized by the Deutsches Ã„rzteblatt across various practices in Germany. During these events, the hosting physician provides participating colleagues with insights into how they integrate digital tools into their practice. This is followed by an in-depth discussion, allowing for a rich exchange of experiences. Last week, the event, moderated by our colleague Dr. Edda Eggers, was hosted by Dr. med. Marc Hanefeld in BremervÃ¶rde. Dr. Hanefeld demonstrated how he has strategically restructured and digitalized his practice's workflows since taking over in recent years. The improved workflow has significantly enhanced the work of the entire team, with medical assistants particularly appreciating the digital advancements. For more details, check out the report on the Ã„rzteblatt website: https://lnkd.in/eSivrNvf A big thank you to Dr. Marc Hanefeld for opening his practice and to all the attendees for the engaging exchange. We are already looking forward to the next event. ğŸ“¸ Participants of the Praxissalon in BremervÃ¶rde /picture-alliance, Ulrich Perrey
